## Scraping
In this part scrape AMAZON products and collections.

- When user gives URLs so find which platform and after scrape according to platform.

- Amazon: 
  1.Uesr can gives collection and products URLs
  2.If Collection url first extrct HTML content and Extrct all Product links and one by one scrape that product
  3.If User gives product URLs so scrape directly. Like: HTML Content by HTTP -> Get all information about product
